meanings.definition: The state or quality of being easily tickled.
meanings.sent1: Her ticklishnesses made her squirm when her friends tickled her.
meanings.sent2: The baby's ticklishnesses always resulted in giggles during playtime.
meanings.sent3: His extreme ticklishnesses made it impossible for him to get a proper foot massage.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the ticklishnesses of excitement before the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The kitten's adorable ticklishnesses brought joy to everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: The tendency to react with laughter or discomfort when touched in a sensitive or vulnerable area.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't control her ticklishnesses when her brother poked her ribs.
meanings.sent2: His ticklishnesses always made him burst into laughter during tickle fights.
meanings.sent3: The ticklishnesses of the situation made it hard for them to keep a straight face.
meanings.sent4: The comedian's jokes had a way of tickling the audience's ticklishnesses.
meanings.sent5: The movie scene was so funny that it triggered everyone's ticklishnesses.
